text: ibeulahim(abeulaham)i malhagil “jeoui junim-isiyeo! i ma-eul(meka)eul anjeonhan gos-eulo mandeul-eo jusigo geugos(meka)ui geojumin jung hananimgwa choehuui nal-eul midneun ja-ege yeolmaeui yangsig-eul jegonghae jusibsio.” geubunkkeseo malsseumhasigil “man-yag bulsinhaneun jaga issdamyeon naneun geuege eolmagan-ui kwaelag-eul nulige han hue buljiog-ui beollo geuleul gangbaghal geos-ila. geugos(buljiog)eun eolmana saaghan gwichagjiinga.”
